name: Fattah
description: A brave warrior with a mysterious past. He wields a sword forged by ancient smiths and seeks justice in a chaotic world.

name: Shofiur
description: A wise scholar with a knack for solving ancient riddles. He travels the lands in search of forgotten lore to restore balance.

name: Rifat
description: A charismatic leader with a fiery spirit. He inspires those around him and fights fiercely to protect his allies.

name: Odity
description: A cunning rogue who navigates the shadows. Her loyalty is questionable, but her skills are unmatched in stealth and strategy.

name: Taiyeba
description: A gentle healer with a deep connection to nature. She uses her powers to mend wounds and bring peace to troubled lands.

name: Orpa
description: A fearless archer with unparalleled precision. She defends her homeland from invaders with her trusty bow and sharp instincts.

name: Faria
description: A fearless archer with unparalleled precision. She defends her homeland from invaders with her trusty bow and sharp instincts.

name: Navana
description: A fearless archer with unparalleled precision. She defends her homeland from invaders with her trusty bow and sharp instincts.
